educational_services.name: Cursus International Study
educational_services.description: Education consulting agency with 20+ years of experience helping Moroccan and sub-Saharan students study abroad. Offers document translation, university admission, visa procedures, accommodation assistance, and recruitment services.

educational_services.name: AMIT Group
educational_services.description: French business school with programs in management and technology at BTS, Bachelor's, and Master's levels. Campus in Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine, France. QUALIOPI certified for training and apprenticeship programs.

educational_services.name: LIL Global Education Services
educational_services.description: UK-based education agency with operations in Morocco. British Council certified agent offering university placement services in UK, USA, Australia, Canada, and Ireland. Provides comprehensive support from application to settlement.

educational_services.name: Istanbul Foundation
educational_services.description: Educational foundation specialized in facilitating study opportunities in Turkey. Works with 298+ partner universities, handling all admission processes for Arab students seeking higher education in Turkey.

educational_services.name: EduRussia/RACUS
educational_services.description: Organization specialized in facilitating admission to Russian universities, particularly for medicine and engineering programs. Operates since 1991 with 77 representative offices worldwide and partnerships with numerous Russian state universities.

educational_services.name: Ajyal Edu
educational_services.description: Educational orientation service for Moroccan students, providing guidance for higher education opportunities.

educational_services.name: Redream
educational_services.description: Agency specialized in facilitating study opportunities in China specifically for Moroccan students. Offers complete guidance from application to arrival in China.

educational_services.name: Tawjih Ba3d LBac
educational_services.description: Post-baccalaureate guidance service with 13+ years of experience helping Moroccan students access higher education. Offers different subscription packages for various academic streams.

educational_services.name: Tawjeeh Sup
educational_services.description: Specialized in helping students apply to 44 grandes écoles in Morocco 'with one click.' Handles registration processes for entrance exams and provides a mobile app for tracking applications.

educational_services.name: EPS Education
educational_services.description: Moroccan education agency with offices in Marrakech, Agadir, and Casablanca. Helps students study abroad in UK, France, Canada, Poland, Spain, and Belgium through consultation, university selection, and visa preparation.

educational_services.name: EFET Maroc
educational_services.description: French technical education institute with 5 campuses in Morocco, 50 years of experience, and 35,000 alumni. Offers programs in commerce, management, finance, IT, logistics, and healthcare from technician to Master's level.

educational_services.name: Institut français du Maroc
educational_services.description: Official French cultural and educational institution in Morocco. Provides French language courses and certifications (DELF, DALF, TCF, TEF), cultural events, resources, and support for study in France.

educational_services.name: Sigma Orientation
educational_services.description: Specialized in preparation for entrance exams to Morocco's grandes écoles. Offers different packages for science, economics, and technical streams with complete follow-up services for applications.

educational_services.name: Al Jisr Tawjih
educational_services.description: Educational orientation service helping Moroccan students navigate higher education options and entrance exam applications.
